vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
MultiplicatorX4.multiplicator (patch_19.sol#18-21) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _address.transfer(this.balance * 4) (patch_19.sol#20)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_19.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (patch_19.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in MultiplicatorX4.command (patch_19.sol#13-16):
	-require(bool)(_address.call.value(msg.value)(_data)) patch_19.sol#15

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_address' of MultiplicatorX4.command (patch_19.sol#13) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_data' of MultiplicatorX4.command (patch_19.sol#13) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_address' of MultiplicatorX4.multiplicator (patch_19.sol#18) is not in mixedCase
